titleStmt.title: An eccho to the voice from heaven, or, A narration of the life, and manner of the special calling, and visions of Arise Evans by him published, in discharge of his duty to God, and for the satisfaction of all those that doubt.
titleStmt.author: Evans, Arise, b. 1607.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Authour, and are to be sold at his House in Long-Alley in Blackfriers,

notesStmt.note: "To the reader" signed: Arise Evans ... Decemb. 19. 1652.
Numerous errors in paging; p. 65-68 repeated in numbering only.
Imperfect: stained, and with print show-through.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
